Find the pprof utility

Source: R/pprof.R
find_pprof.Rd

pprof is a tool for visualization and analysis of profiling data, implemented in Go. This function is a wrapper around proffer::find_pprof() for determining its location on your system.

This function will be called by start_profiler() to ensure that profiling data can be processed by stop_profiler(). A functioning installation of pprof is a prerequisite to use this package.

find_pprof()
